alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; Roosevelt County; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 2:10PM MDT until April 05 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, Curry County, De Baca County, Quay County, Roosevelt County, Eastern San Miguel County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, West Central Highlands and West Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will reduce visibility on area roadways. This includes Interstates 25 and 40 as well as U.S. Highways 60 and 84.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Eastern San Miguel County; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Quay County; Roosevelt County; West Central Highlands; West Central Mountains
